cache_time.label: Cache Time
cache_time.comment: Set the lifetime of the feed before it expire and it's auto-generated (in hours).

last_run_time.label: Last Run Time
last_run_time.comment: The time when the generate feed has run last time.

only_visible.label: Only Visible Products
only_visible.comment: Add to feed only in stock and enabled products.
only_visible.tooltip: To check this you need to add to the feed the following attributes: status, qty, is_in_stock

exclude_catalogrule_products.label: Exclude Products with prices from catalog rules

categories.label: Category
categories.comment:
Include or Exclude products based on the category.

Note for Include:
Simple products within a bundled, configurable or grouped product are treated as own entities, so these should also be present in the included categories.

Note for Exclude:
Exclude the products from these categories. Products that are available within different categories need to be excluded from all of the categories they are assigned to.

show_outofstock.label: Show Out Of Stock Products
show_outofstock.comment: Add to feed out of stock products.

show_currency.label: Show Currency in Price/Special Price Attributes
show_currency.comment: Show currency to price or special price.

prices_combined.label: Prices Combined
prices_combined.comment: Show Only One Field for Price/Special Price.

no_special_from_default.label: No Special Price from Default Store
no_special_from_default.comment: If other store than default, if YES the special price from store is not overridden by default store value.

remove_decimals.label: Remove Decimals From Prices
remove_decimals.comment: This option will remove the decimals and the characters "," and "." from prices attributes.

category_display.label: Categories Display Type
category_display.tooltip: On 'Individual columns' an suffix will be added after the category name like _1, _2, _3, ..

default_categ_id.label: Default Category ID
default_categ_id.tooltip: Feed categories tree only from this ID parent default category. If empty, all categories will show

main_category_separator.label: Categories Separator
main_category_separator.tooltip: In case of CSV Feed File Type be aware that this need to be different from the CSV Delimiter or Enclosure

child_category_separator.label: Child Categories Separator
child_category_separator.tooltip: In case of CSV Feed File Type be aware that this need to be different from the CSV Delimiter or Enclosure

default_category_names.label: Exclude Default Category Names
default_category_names.tooltip: Default Categories Names to be Excluded

simple_price.label: Calculate Simple Product Price Used in Configurable
simple_price.tooltip:
APBP: Associated Product Base Price
CPP: Configurable Product Price
APPD: Associated Product Price Difference
simple_price.comment: If a simple product is associated to more than one configurable products, [CPP + APPD] option doesn't work correctly

fields.enclosure: CSV Field Enclosure text= 120 1 0 1 csv Recommended to be used symbol: "

file_name.label: Feed File Name
file_name.comment: Add the file name without the file extension, example: feed_one

heading.label: Manual Generate Feed (Select the store, save the configuration and push the 'Generate Feed' button)

store_id.label: Store
store_id.tooltip: If you have only one store view or you need a general feed for all stores select the 'Main' store

button_feed.comment: After enabling and saving the feed it will generate in max 10 minutes

cache_time.label: Cache Time
cache_time.comment: Set the lifetime of the feed before it expire and it's auto-generated (in hours).

last_run_time.label: Last Run Time
last_run_time.comment: The time when the generate feed has run last time.

file_name.label: Feed File Name
file_name.comment: Add the file name without the file extension, example: feed_one

heading.label: Manual Generate Feed (Select the store, save the configuration and push the 'Generate Feed' button)

store_id.label: Store
store_id.tooltip: If you have only one store view or you need a general feed for all stores select the 'Main' store

button_feed.comment: After enabling and saving the feed it will generate in max 10 minutes

cache_time.label: Cache Time
cache_time.comment: Set the lifetime of the feed before it expire and it's auto-generated (in hours).

last_run_time.label: Last Run Time
last_run_time.comment: The time when the generate feed has run last time.

only_visible.label: Only Visible Products
only_visible.comment: Add to feed only in stock and enabled products.
only_visible.tooltip: To check this you need to add to the feed the following attributes: status, qty, is_in_stock

exclude_catalogrule_products.label: Exclude Products with prices from catalog rules

categories.label: Category
categories.comment:
Include or Exclude products based on the category.

Note for Include:
Simple products within a bundled, configurable or grouped product are treated as own entities, so these should also be present in the included categories.

Note for Exclude:
Exclude the products from these categories. Products that are available within different categories need to be excluded from all of the categories they are assigned to.

show_outofstock.label: Show Out Of Stock Products
show_outofstock.comment: Add to feed out of stock products.

show_currency.label: Show Currency in Price/Special Price Attributes
show_currency.comment: Show currency to price or special price.

prices_combined.label: Prices Combined
prices_combined.comment: Show Only One Field for Price/Special Price.

no_special_from_default.label: No Special Price from Default Store
no_special_from_default.comment: If other store than default, if YES the special price from store is not overridden by default store value.

remove_decimals.label: Remove Decimals From Prices
remove_decimals.comment: This option will remove the decimals and the characters "," and "." from prices attributes.

category_display.label: Categories Display Type
category_display.tooltip: On 'Individual columns' an suffix will be added after the category name like _1, _2, _3, ..

default_categ_id.label: Default Category ID
default_categ_id.tooltip: Feed categories tree only from this ID parent default category. If empty, all categories will show

main_category_separator.label: Categories Separator
main_category_separator.tooltip: In case of CSV Feed File Type be aware that this need to be different from the CSV Delimiter or Enclosure

child_category_separator.label: Child Categories Separator
child_category_separator.tooltip: In case of CSV Feed File Type be aware that this need to be different from the CSV Delimiter or Enclosure

default_category_names.label: Exclude Default Category Names
default_category_names.tooltip: Default Categories Names to be Excluded

simple_price.label: Calculate Simple Product Price Used in Configurable
simple_price.tooltip:
APBP: Associated Product Base Price
CPP: Configurable Product Price
APPD: Associated Product Price Difference
simple_price.comment: If a simple product is associated to more than one configurable products, [CPP + APPD] option doesn't work correctly

fields.delimiter: CSV Field Delimiter text= 110 1 0 1 csv Recommended to be used symbol: ~
fields.enclosure: CSV Field Enclosure text= 120 1 0 1 csv Recommended to be used symbol: "
